section.p: The Bluewood is the forest that lies south of Dweomer. The magical soil of the island has imbued the vegetation there with a strange actinic glow.

It’s said that a ship whose mast is cut from a Bluewood tree will always find its way back to Braelak Isle. But the book goes on to warn of the many dangers lurking in the forest’s depths, not the least of which is the Wind Spirit that can steal a man’s soul.
